items.editorNote: At CES 2026, major tech players including Nvidia, Intel, and Lenovo are converging on AI hardware innovations, signaling a new phase in the 'super entry point' competition for AI devices.
keyPoints: The article highlights a shift in AI hardware trends sparked by discussions around new device forms at the end of 2025.
CES 2026 reveals a consensus among leading manufacturers to prioritize AI capabilities in their upcoming hardware offerings.
The competition involves key industry giants such as Nvidia ('老黄'), Intel ('苏妈'), and Lenovo, emphasizing integrated AI solutions.
This emerging trend suggests a strategic focus on AI as a core differentiator in consumer and enterprise technology markets.

readOriginal.reason: The original contains nuanced commentary on industry sentiment at CES 2026 and detailed contextual framing of AI hardware evolution that the summary cannot fully replicate.
readOriginal.whoShouldRead: Technology strategists and product managers tracking AI hardware trends and competitive positioning in consumer electronics.

items.originalTitle: 一口气集齐老黄苏妈英特尔，还得是AI，还得是联想
